trans-unit.source: Afterlife
trans-unit.target: 来生

trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated. Its controller puts a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying into play.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。该生物不能重生。该生物的操控者将一个1/1具飞行异能的白色精灵衍生物放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Alabaster Wall
trans-unit.target: 圣洁之墙

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·2 | Alabaster Wall | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: (Walls can't attack.)\noc\nT: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
trans-unit.target: （墙不能攻击）\n横置：在本回合中对目标生物或玩家防止接下来的1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Its mortar is mixed with waters straight from the Fountain of Cho.
trans-unit.target: 建墙用的灰泥，混合了来自于柯族圣泉的水。

trans-unit.source: Armistice
trans-unit.target: 休战协议

trans-unit.source: o3o\nWoo\nW You draw a card and target opponent gains 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 3白白：你抽一张牌，并且目标对手获得3点生命。

trans-unit.source: We all must profit for peace to last.\n—Mercadian saying
trans-unit.target: 最后，我们都将自和平中获益。\n～玛凯迪亚谚语

trans-unit.source: Arrest
trans-unit.target: 逮捕

trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature can't attack or block, and its activated abilities can't be played.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物不可进行攻击或阻挡，并且不可使用其起动式异能。

trans-unit.source: Orim had no memory of the previous night—the first thing she could remember was waking up with the dead guard's blood on her hands.
trans-unit.target: 欧琳对前晚发生的事毫无印象～她能记得的仅止于醒来时，手上沾满了死去守卫的血。

trans-unit.source: Ballista Squad
trans-unit.target: 巨弩小队

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·5 | Ballista Squad | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
o

W, oc
T: CARDNAME deals X damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
trans-unit.target: oX白，横置：CARDNAME对目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物造成X点伤害。

trans-unit.source: The perfect antidote for a tightly packed formation.
trans-unit.target: 对付坚实紧密的阵型之良方。

trans-unit.source: Charm Peddler
trans-unit.target: 护符小贩

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·6 | Charm Peddler | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o\nW, oc\nT, Discard a card from your hand: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to target creature this turn, prevent that damage.
trans-unit.target: 白，横置，从你手上弃掉一张牌：选择一个来源，防止此来源下一次在本回合中对目标生物造成的伤害。

trans-unit.source: Charmed Griffin
trans-unit.target: 受惑的狮鹫

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·7 | Charmed Griffin | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·7 | Charmed Griffin | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, each other player may put an artifact or enchantment card into play from his or her hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，每个其他玩家都可以从他手上放置一张神器或结界牌进场。

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you can afford such a luxury?
trans-unit.target: 你确定自己负担得起这种奢侈品？

trans-unit.source: Cho-Arrim Alchemist
trans-unit.target: 柯‧尔林炼金术士

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·8 | Cho-Arrim Alchemist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
o1o
Wo
W, oc
T, Discard a card from your hand: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage and gain that much life.
trans-unit.target: 1白白，横置，从你手上弃掉一张牌：选择一个来源，防止此来源下一次在本回合中对你造成的伤害，并且你获得与其等量的生命。

trans-unit.source: Cho-Arrim Bruiser
trans-unit.target: 柯‧尔林巨汉

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·9 | Cho-Arrim Bruiser | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME attacks, you may tap up to two target creatures.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以横置最多两个目标生物。

trans-unit.source: He doesn't know why the Cho-Arrim fight the Mercadians, but he's happy to bash heads for them anyway.
trans-unit.target: 他不知道为何柯‧尔林要和玛凯迪亚人作战。不论如何，他倒挺喜欢为他们去砸几个脑袋。

trans-unit.source: Cho-Arrim Legate
trans-unit.target: 柯‧尔林特使

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·10 | Cho-Arrim Legate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Protection from black
trans-unit.target: 反黑保护

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·10 | Cho-Arrim Legate | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: If an opponent controls a swamp and you control a plains, you may play CARDNAME without paying its mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 若任一对手操控沼泽，并且你操控平原，则你不需支付其魔法力费用，便可以使用CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Cho-Manno, Revolutionary
trans-unit.target: 革命家柯‧曼诺

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·11 | Cho-Manno, Revolutionary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 防止所有将对CARDNAME造成的伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Mercadia's masks can no longer hide the truth. Our day has come at last."\n—Cho-Manno
trans-unit.target: 「玛凯迪亚之假面将再也掩藏不住事实。我们的时代终于来临了。」\n～柯‧曼诺

trans-unit.source: Cho-Manno's Blessing
trans-unit.target: 柯‧曼诺的祝福

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·12 | Cho-Manno's Blessing | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may play CARDNAME any time you could play an instant.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在任何能够使用瞬间的时机下，使用CARDNAME。

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·12 | Cho-Manno's Blessing | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME comes into play, choose a color.
trans-unit.target: 在CARDNAME进场时，选择一个颜色。

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·12 | Cho-Manno's Blessing | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature has protection from the chosen color. This effect doesn't remove CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物获得反该色之保护。此效应不会移除CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Common Cause
trans-unit.target: 共同目标

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·13 | Common Cause | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Nonartifact creatures get +2/+2 as long as they all share a color.
trans-unit.target: 只要所有非神器的生物，彼此间至少有一个颜色相同，则这些生物便得+2/+2。

trans-unit.source: Mercadia City's troops are at their best when they have no enemy to fight.
trans-unit.target: 玛凯迪亚的军士，在太平之时简直是所向无敌。

trans-unit.source: Cornered Market
trans-unit.target: 垄断市场

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·14 | Cornered Market | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Players can't play spells or nonbasic lands with the same name as a card in play.
trans-unit.target: 所有玩家不能使用与在场上的牌同名的咒语或非基本地。

trans-unit.source: Don't step on the livelihood of other vendors, or they may step on you.\n—Mercadian saying
trans-unit.target: 别挡了其他小贩的生计，不然他们可会断了你的生路。\n～玛凯迪亚谚语

trans-unit.source: Crackdown
trans-unit.target: 严惩

trans-unit.source: Nonwhite creatures with power 3 or greater don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.
trans-unit.target: 非白色，且力量不小于3的生物，在其操控者的重置步骤中不可重置。

trans-unit.source: "There is no place for mercy in defense of our lives."\n—Ta-Spon, Cho-Arrim executioner
trans-unit.target: 「在生存之战中，没有悲悯容身之处。」\n～柯‧尔林刽子手塔‧斯邦

trans-unit.source: Crossbow Infantry
trans-unit.target: 十字弓步兵

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·16 | Crossbow Infantry | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oc\nT: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
trans-unit.target: 横置：CARDNAME对目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: The crossbow is the ideal weapon for the lazy Mercadians: just point and shoot.
trans-unit.target: 十字弓是懒惰的玛凯迪亚人最理想的武器：只要瞄准并射击。

trans-unit.source: Devout Witness
trans-unit.target: 虔诚的见证人

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·17 | Devout Witness | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o1o\nW, oc\nT, Discard a card from your hand: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 1白，横置，从你手上弃掉一张牌：消灭目标神器或结界。

trans-unit.source: The Cho-Arrim fought Mercadia's decadence with more than just swords.
trans-unit.target: 柯‧尔林族人们在对抗堕落的玛凯迪亚时，不只使用刀剑。

trans-unit.source: Disenchant
trans-unit.target: 消除魔障

trans-unit.source: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标神器或结界。

trans-unit.source: The scepter of power is fragile in a calloused hand.\n—Cho-Arrim saying
trans-unit.target: 冷酷者之力量权杖是脆弱的。\n～柯‧尔林族谚语

trans-unit.source: Fountain Watch
trans-unit.target: 圣泉守卫

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·19 | Fountain Watch | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Artifacts and enchantments you control can't be the target of spells or abilities.
trans-unit.target: 你操控的神器和结界不能成为咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.source: The Cho-Arrim didn't rely only on a secret location to protect their Fountain.
trans-unit.target: 柯‧尔林族人用以保护其圣泉的，并不仅是隐密的位置而已。

trans-unit.source: Fresh Volunteers
trans-unit.target: 新手志愿军

trans-unit.source: Every Cho-Arrim villager is a potential warrior; when they are called, they abandon their peaceful way of life and take up arms to defend it.
trans-unit.target: 每个柯‧尔林村民都随时可成为战士；当召唤来临时，他们背离自己和平的生活方式，举起武器以捍卫它。

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·21 | Honor the Fallen | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Honor the Fallen
trans-unit.target: 追耀逝者

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·21 | Honor the Fallen | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Remove all creature cards in all graveyards from the game. You gain 1 life for each card removed this way.
trans-unit.target: 将所有坟墓场中的生物牌移出游戏。每以此法将一张生物牌移出游戏，你便获得1点生命。

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·21 | Honor the Fallen | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "May the River claim Cho-Manno's body, wherever it lies."\n—Ta-Karnst, Cho-Arrim healer
trans-unit.target: 「不论他长眠何处，愿生命之河带走柯‧曼诺的身躯。」\n～柯‧尔林医疗师塔‧坎斯特

trans-unit.source: Ignoble Soldier
trans-unit.target: 卑劣的士兵

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·22 | Ignoble Soldier | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME becomes blocked, prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by it this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME被阻挡时，防止它在本回合中将要造成的所有战斗伤害。

trans-unit.source: Cowardice is a term invented by those with no cunning.
trans-unit.target: 怯懦是那些缺乏狡计者发明的词。

trans-unit.source: Inviolability
trans-unit.target: 不可侵犯

trans-unit.source: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to enchanted creature.
trans-unit.target: 防止所有将对受此结界的生物造成的伤害。

trans-unit.source: A soldier's faith is magic strong enough to protect against any blade.
trans-unit.target: 战士的信念，是足以抵抗任何剑刃的魔法。

trans-unit.source: Ivory Mask
trans-unit.target: 象牙面具

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·24 | Ivory Mask | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You can't be the target of spells or abilities.
trans-unit.target: 你不能成为咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.source: "I did not choose my role, Orim," said Cho-Manno patiently, "and I suspect Gerrard did not choose his."
trans-unit.target: 「我不曾选择过自己所扮演的角色，欧琳，」柯‧曼诺耐心地说道，「而我猜想杰拉尔德也没选过。」

trans-unit.source: Jhovall Queen
trans-unit.target: 六足豹后

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·25 | Jhovall Queen | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Attacking doesn't cause CARDNAME to tap.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME攻击时不需横置。

trans-unit.source: War-trained jhovalls eat twice their weight in war-trained soldiers daily.
trans-unit.target: 战训的六足豹，其一天的食量是战训士兵体重的两倍。

trans-unit.source: Jhovall Rider
trans-unit.target: 六足豹骑兵

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·26 | Jhovall Rider | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Trample
trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.source: Don't be fooled by the riders' fluid grace—it takes years of practice to ride these beasts.
trans-unit.target: 别被骑士们优雅摆动的乘姿所误导～想要驾驭这些野兽们，得要练习上数年才成。

trans-unit.source: Last Breath
trans-unit.target: 咽气

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·27 | Last Breath | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Remove target creature with power 2 or less from the game. Its controller gains 4 life.
trans-unit.target: 将目标力量不大于2的生物移出游戏。该生物的操控者获得4点生命。

trans-unit.source: "The River flows. My soul returns."
trans-unit.target: 「河水流转，吾魂归矣。」

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·28 | Moment of Silence | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Moment of Silence
trans-unit.target: 沈静时刻

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·28 | Moment of Silence | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player skips his or her combat phase this turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标玩家在本回合中略过他的战斗阶段。

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·28 | Moment of Silence | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The silence commemorates not those who've died, but those about to.
trans-unit.target: 这静寂并非为了纪念逝者，而是即将逝去的灵魂。

trans-unit.source: Moonlit Wake
trans-unit.target: 月光守灵

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·29 | Moonlit Wake | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature is put into a graveyard from play, you gain 1 life.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一生物从场上进入坟墓场时，你获得1点生命。

trans-unit.source: "As long as Rushwood glows, no life is ever truly lost."\n—Ta-Karnst, Cho-Arrim healer
trans-unit.target: 「只要银叶林继续闪耀著，生命将永不流逝。」\n～柯‧尔林医疗师塔‧坎斯特

trans-unit.source: Muzzle
trans-unit.target: 口络

trans-unit.source: Prevent all damage that would be dealt by enchanted creature.
trans-unit.target: 防止所有将由受此结界的生物所造成的伤害。

trans-unit.source: Clenched teeth do not bite.\n—Cho-Arrim saying
trans-unit.target: 咬紧的牙就不会乱咬。\n～柯‧尔林族谚语

trans-unit.source: Nightwind Glider
trans-unit.target: 夜风滑翔翼

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·31 | Nightwind Glider | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, protection from black
trans-unit.target: 飞行，反黑保护

trans-unit.source: Once you learn to float on the shadows, you'll never fear them again.
trans-unit.target: 只要你知晓如何在暗影间飘行，你将再也不会为其畏惧。

trans-unit.source: Noble Purpose
trans-unit.target: 崇高意志

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·32 | Noble Purpose | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage, you gain that much life.
trans-unit.target: 每当你操控的生物造成战斗伤害时，你获得与其等量的生命。

trans-unit.source: Fighting for the right reason is itself a source of strength.
trans-unit.target: 为正道而战这件事，便是其力量来源之一部份。

trans-unit.source: Orim's Cure
trans-unit.target: 欧琳的医治

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·33 | Orim's Cure | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you control a plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control instead of paying the mana cost of CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 若你操控平原，你可改为横置一个你操控的未横置生物，以代替支付CARDNAME之魔法力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·33 | Orim's Cure | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Prevent the next 4 damage that would be dealt to target creature or player this turn.
trans-unit.target: 在本回合中对目标生物或玩家防止接下来的4点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Pious Warrior
trans-unit.target: 虔诚的战士

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·34 | Pious Warrior | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME受到战斗伤害时，你获得与其等量的生命。

trans-unit.source: The Cho-Arrim make no distinction between healers and soldiers.
trans-unit.target: 柯‧尔林族对战士和医疗者并没有清楚的划分。

trans-unit.source: Ramosian Captain
trans-unit.target: 瑞莫斯教队长

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·35 | Ramosian Captain | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\no5, oc\nT: Search your library for a Rebel card with converted mana cost 4 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 先攻\n5，横置：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总魔法力费用不大于4的反抗军牌，并将其放置进场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: The Cho-Arrim believe in leading by example.
trans-unit.target: 柯‧尔林族人们笃信以身作则之理。

trans-unit.source: Ramosian Commander
trans-unit.target: 瑞莫斯教指挥官

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·36 | Ramosian Commander | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o6, oc\nT: Search your library for a Rebel card with converted mana cost 5 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 6，横置：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总魔法力费用不大于5的反抗军牌，并将其放置进场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "Cho-Manno guides your spirit. I guide your sword."
trans-unit.target: 「柯‧曼诺引导你的心灵。我则引导你的剑刃。」

trans-unit.source: Ramosian Lieutenant
trans-unit.target: 瑞莫斯教尉官

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·37 | Ramosian Lieutenant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o4, oc\nT: Search your library for a Rebel card with converted mana cost 3 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 4，横置：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总魔法力费用不大于3的反抗军牌，并将其放置进场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: "Give me your hand and I will give you victory."
trans-unit.target: 「将双手交付给我，我将把胜利交付给你。」

trans-unit.source: Ramosian Rally
trans-unit.target: 瑞莫斯式动员

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·38 | Ramosian Rally | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you control a plains, you may tap an untapped creature you control instead of paying CARDNAME's mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 若你操控平原，你可改为横置一个你操控的未横置生物，以代替支付CARDNAME之魔法力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·38 | Ramosian Rally | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 你操控的生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Ramosian Sergeant
trans-unit.target: 瑞莫斯教士官

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·39 | Ramosian Sergeant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o3, oc\nT: Search your library for a Rebel card with converted mana cost 2 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 3，横置：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总魔法力费用不大于2的反抗军牌，并将其放置进场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Her commands are part rallying cry, part sermon, and wholly undeniable.
trans-unit.target: 她的命令半是振奋、半是训诫，而且绝不容争辩。

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·40 | Ramosian Sky Marshal | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ramosian Sky Marshal
trans-unit.target: 瑞莫斯教飞将

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·40 | Ramosian Sky Marshal | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\no7, oc\nT: Search your library for a Rebel card with converted mana cost 6 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 飞行\n7，横置：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总魔法力费用不大于6的反抗军牌，并将其放置进场。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·40 | Ramosian Sky Marshal | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Cho-Arrim fell from the sky onto Mercadia City like a vengeful rain.
trans-unit.target: 柯‧尔林族人如复仇之雨般，自天空降临于玛凯迪亚城。

trans-unit.source: Rappelling Scouts
trans-unit.target: 缍降斥候

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·41 | Rappelling Scouts | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\no2oo\nW CARDNAME gains protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行\n2白：CARDNAME获得你所选择颜色之反色保护，直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Renounce
trans-unit.target: 断绝关系

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice any number of permanents. You gain 2 life for each one sacrificed this way.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲任意数量的永久物。你每以此法牺牲一个永久物，便获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: Gerrard offered no defense to Orim's condemnation; the mission was under his command, and he was responsible.
trans-unit.target: 面对欧琳的谴责，杰拉尔德毫不加以辩解；此行动是由他指挥，是以他理应负责。

trans-unit.source: Revered Elder
trans-unit.target: 尊贵长者

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·43 | Revered Elder | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: o1: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to CARDNAME this turn.
trans-unit.target: 1：在本回合中对CARDNAME防止接下来的1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: The Cho-Arrim worship life and revere those who've experienced it longest.
trans-unit.target: 柯‧尔林族人尊崇生命，并且敬重能体验生命最久者。

trans-unit.source: Reverent Mantra
trans-unit.target: 虔敬的祈祷文

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·44 | Reverent Mantra | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: You may remove a white card in your hand from the game instead of paying CARDNAME's mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 你可改为将你手上的一张白色牌移出游戏，以代替支付CARDNAME之魔法力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·44 | Reverent Mantra | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: All creatures gain protection from the color of your choice until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 所有的生物获得你所选择颜色之反色保护，直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Righteous Aura
trans-unit.target: 正直的氛围

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·45 | Righteous Aura | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o\nW, Pay 2 life: The next time a source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
trans-unit.target: 白，支付2点生命：选择一个伤害来源，防止此来源下一次在本回合中对你造成的伤害。

trans-unit.source: "There is a great difference between pain and injury."\n—Cho-Manno
trans-unit.target: 「痛苦与伤害有著天差地别。」\n～柯‧曼诺

trans-unit.source: Righteous Indignation
trans-unit.target: 义愤

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·46 | Righteous Indignation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature blocks a black or red creature, the blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一生物阻挡黑色或红色生物时，该进行阻挡的生物便得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: "You are the disease that plagues Mercadia. I am the healer's knife that will cut you out."
trans-unit.target: 「你是玛凯迪亚染上的恶疾；我是用来切除你的治疗刀。」

trans-unit.source: Security Detail
trans-unit.target: 保安特遣队

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·47 | Security Detail | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o\nWoo\nW Put a 1/1 white Soldier creature token into play. Play this ability only if you control no creatures and only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 白白：放置一个1/1白色士兵衍生物进场。你只能在你未操控任何生物时使用此异能，并且每回合只能使用一次。

trans-unit.source: Soothing Balm
trans-unit.target: 镇痛香膏

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·48 | Soothing Balm | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player gains 5 life.
trans-unit.target: 目标玩家获得5点生命。

trans-unit.source: Orim taught Ta-Karnst and the other Cho-Arrim healers a far less invasive method of healing.
trans-unit.target: 欧琳教导塔‧坎斯特和其他柯‧尔林医疗师们，与他们原用的方法相较之下温和至极的医疗方法。

trans-unit.source: Spiritual Focus
trans-unit.target: 心灵集中

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·49 | Spiritual Focus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard a card, you gain 2 life and you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当由任何对手操控的咒语或异能使得你弃一张牌时，你便获得2点生命，并且可以抽一张牌。

trans-unit.source: Steadfast Guard
trans-unit.target: 坚定的护卫

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·50 | Steadfast Guard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Attacking doesn't cause CARDNAME to tap.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME攻击时不须横置。

trans-unit.source: The Mercadians were prepared for the guard, but the guard was even more prepared for the Mercadians.
trans-unit.target: 玛凯迪亚人已准备迎击护卫，但是护卫的准备却比他们更加充分。

trans-unit.source: Story Circle
trans-unit.target: 诵传仪典

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·51 | Story Circle | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME comes into play, choose a color.\noo\nW The next time a source of your choice of the chosen color would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
trans-unit.target: 在CARDNAME进场时，选择一个颜色。\n白：选择一个该色的伤害来源，防止此来源下一次在本回合中对你造成的伤害。

trans-unit.source: Task Force
trans-unit.target: 特遣部队

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·52 | Task Force | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME becomes the target of a spell or ability, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME成为咒语或异能的目标时，它得+0/+3直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: They are the reflection of Rushwood's glow on the edge of a wooden sword.
trans-unit.target: 他们正如银叶林的光辉闪耀于木剑之锋。

trans-unit.source: Thermal Glider
trans-unit.target: 暖流滑翔翼

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·53 | Thermal Glider | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, protection from red
trans-unit.target: 飞行，反红保护

trans-unit.source: "The Mercadians are too busy looking down on us to see us coming."\n—Cho-Arrim rebel
trans-unit.target: 「玛凯迪亚人过于轻视我们，察觉不到我们的来临。」\n～柯‧尔林反抗军

trans-unit.source: Tonic Peddler
trans-unit.target: 补药小贩

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·54 | Tonic Peddler | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o\nW, oc\nT, Discard a card from your hand: Target player gains 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 白，横置，从你手上弃掉一张牌：目标玩家获得3点生命。

trans-unit.source: "The price is written at the bottom of the cup."
trans-unit.target: 「价钱写在杯底上。」

trans-unit.source: Trap Runner
trans-unit.target: 陷阱奔越者

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·55 | Trap Runner | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oc\nT: Target attacking unblocked creature becomes blocked. (This ability works on unblockable creatures.)
trans-unit.target: 横置：目标进行攻击，且未受阻挡的生物视为已被阻挡。（此异能对不可被阻挡的生物也有效）

trans-unit.source: "How could I catch her when the trees conspired to stop me?"
trans-unit.target: 「要是这些树都和她同谋来阻止我，我要如何追上她？」

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·56 | Wave of Reckoning | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Wave of Reckoning
trans-unit.target: 审判之浪潮

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·56 | Wave of Reckoning | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each creature deals to itself damage equal to its power.
trans-unit.target: 每个生物对自己造成等同于该生物力量的伤害。

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·56 | Wave of Reckoning | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Inner conflict can defeat a soldier more quickly than any army.
trans-unit.target: 内里的争斗，要比任何军队还容易击败兵士。

trans-unit.source: Wishmonger
trans-unit.target: 愿望贩子

trans-unit.source: o2: Target creature gains protection from the color of its controller's choice until end of turn. Any player may play this ability.
trans-unit.target: 2：目标生物获得其操控者所选择颜色之反色保护，直到回合结束。任何玩家都可使用此异能。

trans-unit.source: "It's not what you ask for, but how you ask for it."
trans-unit.target: 「问题不在于你要什么，而在于你如何去要。」

trans-unit.source: Aerial Caravan
trans-unit.target: 空中商队

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·58 | Aerial Caravan | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Flying
o1o
Uo
U: Remove the top card of your library from the game. Until end of turn, you may play that card as though it were in your hand. (Reveal the card as you remove it from the game.)
trans-unit.target: 飞行\n1蓝蓝：将你牌库顶的牌移出游戏。你可以将该牌视为如同是在你手上一般地使用，直到回合结束。（将该牌移出游戏时，需展示之）

trans-unit.source: Successful delivery is *not* guaranteed.
trans-unit.target: 无法保证安全送达。

trans-unit.source: Balloon Peddler
trans-unit.target: 气球小贩

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·59 | Balloon Peddler | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o\nU, oc\nT, Discard a card from your hand: Target creature gains flying until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 蓝，横置，从你手上弃掉一张牌：目标生物获得飞行异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: The market festival turned out to be the high point of Jaffy's visit.
trans-unit.target: 市场庆典成了贾菲游览的最高点。

trans-unit.source: Blockade Runner
trans-unit.target: 封锁线奔越者

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·60 | Blockade Runner | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oo\nU CARDNAME is unblockable this turn.
trans-unit.target: 蓝：CARDNAME此回合不能被阻挡。

trans-unit.source: "I need to get back to Mercadia City," said Sisay. "We can get you there," the vizier answered. "Easily."
trans-unit.target: 「我得回到玛凯迪亚城。」西赛说。「我们能带你过去，」领主回答，「容易的很」。

trans-unit.source: Brainstorm
trans-unit.target: 脑力激荡

trans-unit.source: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 抽三张牌。然后将你手上两张牌以任意顺序置于你的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: "I see more than others do because I know where to look."\n—Saprazzan vizier
trans-unit.target: 「我之所以看得比其他人更清楚，是因为我知道要看哪里。」\n～萨帕佐领主

trans-unit.source: Bribery
trans-unit.target: 贿赂

trans-unit.source: Search target opponent's library for a creature card and put that card into play under your control. That player then shuffles his or her library.
trans-unit.target: 从目标对手的牌库中搜寻一张生物牌，并将该牌在你的操控下放置进场。然后该玩家将牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: In Mercadia City, loyalties extend only as far as your purse can stretch.
trans-unit.target: 在玛凯迪亚城，你的财产能延续多久，忠心就能延续多久。

trans-unit.source: Buoyancy
trans-unit.target: 浮力

trans-unit.source: You may play CARDNAME any time you could play an instant.
trans-unit.target: 你可以在任何能够使用瞬间的时机下，使用CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature has flying.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界之生物获得飞行异能。

trans-unit.source: Saprazzan merfolk become legged on land, but some find it quicker to bring the water with them.
trans-unit.target: 萨帕佐人鱼可以在陆地上行走，但有些人鱼觉得带著水走更快。

trans-unit.source: Chambered Nautilus
trans-unit.target: 鹦鹂螺

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·64 | Chambered Nautilus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME becomes blocked, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME被阻挡时，你可以抽一张牌。

trans-unit.source: What's merely a home for the nautilus can become exquisite jewelry in the hands of Saprazzan artisans.
trans-unit.target: 只不过是鹦鹂螺的家，在萨帕佐工艺家手中却能成为无上的珍宝。

trans-unit.source: Chameleon Spirit
trans-unit.target: 变色精灵

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·65 | Chameleon Spirit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME comes into play, choose a color.
trans-unit.target: 在CARDNAME进场时，选择一个颜色。

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·65 | Chameleon Spirit | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the number of permanents of the chosen color your opponents control.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME的力量与防御力，等同于所有对手操控之该色永久物的数量。

trans-unit.source: Charisma
trans-unit.target: 领袖魅力

trans-unit.source: Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a creature, you control that creature as long as CARDNAME remains in play.
trans-unit.target: 每当受此结界的生物对任何生物造成伤害时，只要CARDNAME持续在场，你便操控该生物。

trans-unit.source: It was Gerrard's nature to lead and the Mercadians' to follow.
trans-unit.target: 杰拉尔德的天性是领导，玛凯迪亚人的天性是追随。

trans-unit.source: Cloud Sprite
trans-unit.target: 云仙子

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·67 | Cloud Sprite | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·67 | Cloud Sprite | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME may block only creatures with flying.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME只能阻挡具飞行异能的生物。

trans-unit.source: The delicate sprites carry messages for Saprazzans, but they refuse to land in Mercadia City's filthy markets.
trans-unit.target: 虽然娇美的仙子们为萨帕佐人传递讯息，但他们拒绝降临玛凯迪亚城的肮脏市集。

trans-unit.source: Coastal Piracy
trans-unit.target: 沿海盗虐

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·68 | Coastal Piracy | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to an opponent, you may draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 每当你操控的生物对任一对手造成战斗伤害时，你可以抽一张牌。

trans-unit.source: "I don't like to think of myself as a pirate. I'm more like a stimulator of the local economy."
trans-unit.target: 「我不喜欢把自己当成海盗，较合我意的说法，是促进地方经济发展的人。」

trans-unit.source: Counterspell
trans-unit.target: 反击咒语

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语

trans-unit.source: "Your attack has been rendered harmless. It is, however, quite pretty."\n—Saprazzan vizier
trans-unit.target: 「虽然你的攻击已化为乌有，但看来仍十分炫丽。」\n～萨帕佐领主

trans-unit.source: Cowardice
trans-unit.target: 怯懦

trans-unit.source: Whenever a creature becomes the target of a spell or ability, return that creature to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一生物成为咒语或异能的目标时，将该生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Gerrard was the Mercadian soldiers' greatest hero; they followed him blindly. When he left, they stumbled around blindly.
trans-unit.target: 杰拉尔德是玛凯迪亚士兵的大英雄；他们盲目地追随。当他离开后，他们也盲目地四散奔逃。

trans-unit.source: Customs Depot
trans-unit.target: 海关

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·71 | Customs Depot | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever you play a creature spell, you may pay o1. If you do, draw a card, then discard a card from your hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当你使用生物咒语时，你可支付1。若你如此做，抽一张牌，再从你手上弃一张牌。

trans-unit.source: A bribe is always faster than filling out paperwork.
trans-unit.target: 贿赂总是比填表格来得快。

trans-unit.source: Darting Merfolk
trans-unit.target: 急冲人鱼

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·72 | Darting Merfolk | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oo\nU Return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 蓝：将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: You might as well try to catch water with a net.
trans-unit.target: 你也可以试著用网子来捕水。

trans-unit.source: Dehydration
trans-unit.target: 脱水

trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物在其操控者的重置步骤中不可重置。

trans-unit.source: "You say Saprazzo is a city built on water? I hope they have enough to wash the dust from my throat."\n—Sisay
trans-unit.target: 「你说萨帕佐是个建在水上的城市？我希望他们有够多的水，能清一清我喉咙里的灰尘。」\n～西赛

trans-unit.source: Diplomatic Escort
trans-unit.target: 外交官护卫

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·74 | Diplomatic Escort | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o\nU, oc\nT, Discard a card from your hand: Counter target spell or ability that targets a creature.
trans-unit.target: 蓝，横置，从你手上弃掉一张牌：反击以生物为目标的目标咒语或异能。

trans-unit.source: Diplomatic Immunity
trans-unit.target: 外交豁免权

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·75 | Diplomatic Immunity | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchanted creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.
trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物不能成为咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·75 | Diplomatic Immunity | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME can't be the target of spells or abilities.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME不能成为咒语或异能的目标。

trans-unit.source: Drake Hatchling
trans-unit.target: 龙兽幼雏

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·76 | Drake Hatchling | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\noo\nU CARDNAME gets +1/+0 until end of turn. Play this ability only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行\n蓝：CARDNAME得+1/+0直到回合结束。此异能每回合只能使用一次。

trans-unit.source: There is beauty in the space between learning to fly and taking it for granted.
trans-unit.target: 学习飞行与飞得理所当然，是以美的观点来区分。

trans-unit.source: Embargo
trans-unit.target: 限制交易

trans-unit.source: Nonland permanents don't untap during their controllers' untap steps.\nAt the beginning of your upkeep, you lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 非地永久物不能在其操控者的重置步骤中被重置。在你的维持开始时，你失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: Energy Flux
trans-unit.target: 能量泄裂

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·78 | Energy Flux | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All artifacts gain "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this artifact unless you pay o2."
trans-unit.target: 所有神器获得「在你的维持开始时，除非你支付2，否则牺牲此神器。」

trans-unit.source: Karn said nothing—he just grasped the powerstone and squeezed tightly. The wild flashing ceased.
trans-unit.target: 卡恩什么也没说～他只是握住魔力石紧紧挤压。不规则的闪光就这么停了下来。

trans-unit.source: Extravagant Spirit
trans-unit.target: 奢豪精灵

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·79 | Extravagant Spirit | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·79 | Extravagant Spirit | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice CARDNAME unless you pay o1 for each card in your hand.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，除非你为每张手牌支付1，否则牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: The fewer your possessions, the fewer your worries.
trans-unit.target: 财产越少，担心越少。

trans-unit.source: False Demise
trans-unit.target: 诈死

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·80 | False Demise | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When enchanted creature is put into a graveyard, return that creature to play under your control.
trans-unit.target: 当受此结界的生物置入坟墓场时，将该生物在你的操控下放置进场。

trans-unit.source: "Go down there and fish him out. Maybe his hide will fetch a price."
trans-unit.target: 「下去把藏在那儿的家伙给逮上来，也许可以卖个好价钱。」

trans-unit.source: Glowing Anemone
trans-unit.target: 发光海葵

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·81 | Glowing Anemone | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, you may return target land to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，你可将目标地移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Beautiful to behold, terrible to be held.
trans-unit.target: 看到它很美，被抓到很惨。

trans-unit.source: Gush
trans-unit.target: 宣泄

trans-unit.source: You may return two islands you control to their owner's hand instead of paying CARDNAME's mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 你可改为将你操控的两张海岛移回其拥有者手上，以代替支付CARDNAME的魔法力费用。

trans-unit.source: Draw two cards.
trans-unit.target: 抽两张牌。

trans-unit.source: Don't trust your secrets to the sea.
trans-unit.target: 别向大海透露你的秘密。

trans-unit.source: High Seas
trans-unit.target: 外海

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·83 | High Seas | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Red creature spells and green creature spells cost o1 more to play.
trans-unit.target: 红色生物咒语与绿色生物咒语需额外消费1才可使用。

trans-unit.source: Bend as the wave breaks or it will break you as well.\n—Saprazzan saying
trans-unit.target: 浪打来时闪开一下，否则它会把你打碎。\n～萨帕佐谚语

trans-unit.source: Hoodwink

trans-unit.source: Return target artifact, enchantment, or land to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将目标神器，结界或地移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: The youths of Rishada's marketplace are always ready for a quick footrace.
trans-unit.target: 力夏达市集的年轻人，随时有拔腿就跑的准备。

trans-unit.source: Indentured Djinn

trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, each other player may draw up to three cards.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，每个其他玩家可抽最多三张牌。

trans-unit.source: It's not always clear who's the master and who's the servant.
trans-unit.target: 谁主谁仆并非总是那么清楚。

trans-unit.source: Misdirection

trans-unit.target: 你可改为将手上一张蓝色牌移出游戏，以代替支付CARDNAME的魔法力费用。

trans-unit.target: 失足

trans-unit.source: The feet have no eyes.\n—Saprazzan saying
trans-unit.target: 脚不长眼睛。\n～萨帕佐谚语

o3o

trans-unit.source: "It's no challenge to master a Mercadian."

trans-unit.target: 景色真的十分壮观～只要你不看力夏达。

trans-unit.source: Rishadan Cutpurse
trans-unit.target: 力夏达扒手

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，每个对手须支付1，否则该玩家牺牲一个永久物。

trans-unit.source: The bigger the purse, the greater the fool.\n—Rishadan saying
trans-unit.target: 皮包越大，傻子越傻。\n～力夏达谚语

trans-unit.target: 力夏达拦路贼

trans-unit.source: "The best things in life are free. Money, for instance."
trans-unit.target: 「生命中最美好的事都是免费的。举个例子，就像钱。」

trans-unit.target: 航行贩子

trans-unit.source: Clients who cheat the sailmonger make an impact on the rest.
trans-unit.target: 诈骗航行贩子的客人，还会拖累到其他人。

Islandwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls an island.)
You may choose not to untap CARDNAME during your untap step.
oc

trans-unit.source: Saprazzan Bailiff
trans-unit.target: 萨帕佐法警

trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, remove all artifact and enchantment cards in all graveyards from the game.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，将所有坟墓场中所有神器及结界牌移出游戏。

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·97 | Saprazzan Bailiff | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME leaves play, return all artifact and enchantment cards from all graveyards to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME离场时，将所有坟墓场中所有神器及结界牌移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.target: 萨帕佐破浪兽

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME becomes blocked, you may draw three cards.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME被阻挡时，你可以抽三张牌。

trans-unit.source: Within the walls of the floating city, Saprazzan wealth is like Saprazzan water: abundant, free-flowing, and accessible to all.
trans-unit.target: 在这座漂浮之城的围墙内，萨帕佐的财富就如同萨帕佐的水：充沛、自由流动，而且人人可以取用。

trans-unit.source: Saprazzan Legate
trans-unit.target: 萨帕佐特使

trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·100 | Saprazzan Legate | Card Text | Paragraph 2

trans-unit.target: 若任一对手操控山脉，并且你操控海岛，则你不需支付其魔法力费用，便可以使用CARDNAME。

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进行攻击或阻挡时，在战斗结束时将它置于其拥有者的牌库顶。

trans-unit.source: The Saprazzans excel at both tactics: hit *and* run.
trans-unit.target: 萨帕佐人有两项无人能及的战技：打带跑。

trans-unit.source: Saprazzan Raider
trans-unit.target: 萨帕佐突击队

trans-unit.source: Some quick dagger work and then back to the sea—that's the Saprazzan way.
trans-unit.target: 几柄快速的匕首攻击后再回到海中～这就是萨帕佐的风格。

trans-unit.source: Shoving Match

trans-unit.source: Rishadan barkeeps know something the Mercadians have yet to learn: if you keep pushing, someone will eventually push back.
trans-unit.target: 力夏达酒保知道一些玛凯迪亚人还没学会的事：如果你持续施压，对方最后一定会反弹回来。

o3o
Uoo

trans-unit.source: The vizier's wisdom proved invaluable in untangling the Mercadian knot of lies.
trans-unit.target: 为了解开玛凯迪亚纠结的谎言，领主的智慧显得更加珍贵。

trans-unit.target: 巫术咒语需额外消费3才可使用。

trans-unit.target: 海盗们宁愿接受力夏达快速而残酷的审判，也不愿尝试萨帕佐耐性的刑罚。

trans-unit.target: 防止你操控的生物将被造成，与将要造成的所有战斗伤害。

trans-unit.source: "Inside these walls, peace; outside, sharks. You choose."\n—Saprazzan vizier
trans-unit.target: 「城墙内，和平；城墙外，鲨鱼。你自己选择。」\n～萨帕佐领主

trans-unit.source: The worst thing about being a depraved pirate is having to work with a bunch of depraved pirates.
trans-unit.target: 做为一个卑鄙海盗，最糟糕的就是得和一群卑鄙海盗为伍。

trans-unit.target: 蓝，横置，从你手上弃掉一张牌：将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Closing time comes earlier to some than to others.

trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME被阻挡时，防御玩家便从手上弃掉一张牌。

trans-unit.target: 一个人转移受害者的注意力，另一个趁机拿取财宝。

trans-unit.target: 黑市

trans-unit.target: 腐沼走私犯

trans-unit.source: They slide over the bog like oil across glass.
trans-unit.target: 他们在腐沼中流窜，正如同油渍在玻璃上滑溜。

trans-unit.source: The world is the body. The mana is the blood. The witch is the surgeon.
trans-unit.target: 世界是身躯，魔法力是血液，巫师则是医者。

o

trans-unit.source: The touch of his madness can drive anyone into a killing frenzy.
trans-unit.target: 他的疯邪触碰，能驱使任何人陷入杀戮的狂乱。

trans-unit.source: Cateran Brute
trans-unit.target: 卡特蓝打手

trans-unit.target: 2，横置：从你的牌库中搜寻一张总魔法力费用不大于2的佣兵牌，并将该牌放置进场。之后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: The Cateran guild prefers to call them "public relations."
trans-unit.target: 卡特蓝公会喜欢称他们为「公关」。

trans-unit.source: Cateran Enforcer
trans-unit.target: 卡特蓝强胁者

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·121 | Cateran Enforcer | Card Text | Paragraphs

trans-unit.source: Recruits aren't always volunteers.
trans-unit.target: 新兵不一定都是自愿加入的。

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·123 | Cateran Overlord | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Sacrifice a creature: Regenerate CARDNAME.\no6, oc\nT: Search your library for a Mercenary card with converted mana cost 6 or less and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张佣兵牌，展示该牌并将其放至手上。之后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Even when recruitment is slow, the guild can always cook something up.
trans-unit.target: 虽然征召速度很慢，但公会总有办法编造一些东西出来。

trans-unit.source: Conspiracy
trans-unit.target: 同谋

trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME comes into play, choose a creature type.
trans-unit.target: 在CARDNAME进场时，选择一个生物类别。

trans-unit.source: Creatures you control and creature cards in your graveyard, hand, and library are of the chosen type.
trans-unit.target: 你操控的生物以及你坟墓场、手上，和牌库中的生物牌，都成为你所选择的生物类别。

trans-unit.target: 贪污的官僚

trans-unit.target: 2黑：重生CARDNAME。\n每当CARDNAME被阻挡时，防御玩家从手上随机弃掉一张牌。

trans-unit.source: His favor comes at a high price.

Bo
Bo

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player reveals the top card of his or her library. If all cards revealed this way are creature cards, put those cards into play under their owners' control. (Otherwise, put them back face-down on top of their owners' libraries.)
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，每位玩家展示其牌库顶的第一张牌。若以此法展示之所有牌均为生物牌，将这些牌在其拥有者的操控下放置进场。（否则，将这些牌面朝下地放回其拥有者的牌库顶）。

trans-unit.source: Giant Caterpillar
trans-unit.target: 巨型毛虫

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·249 | Giant Caterpillar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o\nG, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Put a 1/1 green Butterfly creature token with flying into play at end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 绿，牺牲CARDNAME：将一个1/1具飞行异能的绿色蝴蝶衍生物在回合结束时放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Groundskeeper
trans-unit.target: 家园守卫

trans-unit.source: o1oo\nG Return target basic land card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 1绿：将目标基本地牌从你的坟墓场中移回你的手上。

trans-unit.source: Whereas the rebels fight to defend the land, they work to renew it.
trans-unit.target: 既然反抗军为了保卫土地而战，他们也努力重建土地。

trans-unit.source: Horned Troll
trans-unit.target: 角巨魔

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·251 | Horned Troll | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: oo\nG Regenerate CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 绿：重生CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: "If I says it's a troll, it's a troll. Goblins is always right in Mercadia."\n—Squee
trans-unit.target: 「如果我说它是巨魔，它就是巨魔。在玛凯迪亚鬼怪永远是对的。」\n～斯奎

trans-unit.source: Howling Wolf
trans-unit.target: 嚎叫野狼

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·252 | Howling Wolf | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, you may search your library for up to three CARDNAME cards, reveal them, and put them into your hand. If you do, shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，你可从你的牌库中搜寻最多三张CARDNAME牌，展示它们，并置入你的手牌中。若你如此做，将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Hunted Wumpus
trans-unit.target: 捕获的狮头象

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·253 | Hunted Wumpus | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME comes into play, each other player may put a creature card from his or her hand into play under his or her control.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，每个其他玩家都可以从手上将一张生物牌在其操控下放置进场。

trans-unit.source: Just one can feed a dozen people for a month.
trans-unit.target: 只要一只就能养活一打人整个月。

trans-unit.source: Invigorate
trans-unit.target: 鼓舞

trans-unit.source: If you control a forest, you may have an opponent gain 3 life instead of paying CARDNAME's mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 若你操控树林，你可改为让任一对手得到3点生命，以代替支付CARDNAME的魔法力费用。

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得+4/+4直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Land Grant
trans-unit.target: 授地

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·255 | Land Grant | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: If you have no land cards in hand, you may reveal your hand instead of paying CARDNAME's mana cost.
trans-unit.target: 若你手上没有地牌，你可改为展示你的手牌，以代替支付CARDNAME的魔法力费用。

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·255 | Land Grant | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Search your library for a forest card and put that card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: 从你的牌库中搜寻一张树林，并置入你的手牌中。然后将你的牌库洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Ley Line
trans-unit.target: 魔力小径

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·256 | Ley Line | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player may put a +1/+1 counter on target creature.
trans-unit.target: 在每位玩家的维持开始时，该玩家可放置一个+1/+1指示物在目标生物上。

trans-unit.source: "I can feel the strength of the entire forest."\n—Gerrard
trans-unit.target: 「我能感觉到整座森林的力量。」\n～杰拉尔德

trans-unit.source: Lumbering Satyr
trans-unit.target: 伐木沙德兽

trans-unit.source: All creatures gain forestwalk. (They're unblockable as long as defending player controls a forest.)
trans-unit.target: 所有生物获得树林行者异能。（若防御玩家操控任何树林，则此生物无法被阻挡）

trans-unit.source: The satyr carves the path that all of Rushwood follows.\n—Cho-Arrim saying
trans-unit.target: 沙德兽开路，银叶林众随。\n～柯‧尔林族谚语

trans-unit.source: Lure
trans-unit.target: 诱饵

trans-unit.source: All creatures able to block enchanted creature do so if able.
trans-unit.target: 所有能够阻挡受此结界之生物的生物皆需阻挡它。

trans-unit.source: Deepwood's reach is not long, so it invites its enemies in.
trans-unit.target: 深邃林腹地不大，因此引敌人入瓮。

trans-unit.source: Megatherium
trans-unit.target: 大地懒兽

trans-unit.target: 践踏

trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进场时，你手上每有一张牌，则支付1，否则牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Natural Affinity
trans-unit.target: 自然血缘

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·260 | Natural Affinity | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: All lands become 2/2 creatures until end of turn. They still count as lands.
trans-unit.target: 所有地都成为2/2生物，直到回合结束。这些生物仍视为地。

trans-unit.source: As long as the dryads are a part of the forest, the forest is a part of the army.
trans-unit.target: 只要树灵仍是森林的一部份，森林就仍是军队的一员。

trans-unit.source: Pangosaur
trans-unit.target: 鲮鲤恐龙

trans-unit.source: Whenever a player plays a land, return CARDNAME to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一玩家使用地时，将CARDNAME移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.source: Only Rushwood is vast enough to swallow this creature whole.
trans-unit.target: 只有银叶林大得能够吞下这整只生物。

trans-unit.source: Revive
trans-unit.target: 复苏

trans-unit.source: Return target green card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 将目标绿色牌从你的坟墓场中移回你的手上。

trans-unit.source: Gerrard's heart ached, recalling the living wreath Mirri laid for her dead kin. No such memorial was left for her in Rath.
trans-unit.target: 想起米丽为死去家人埋葬的花环，杰拉尔德为之心痛不已。因为在瑞斯，不会有人为她如此作。

trans-unit.source: Rushwood Dryad

trans-unit.source: Forestwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player controls a forest.)
trans-unit.target: 树林行者（若防御玩家操控任何树林，则此生物无法被阻挡）

trans-unit.source: Rushwood is a living jewel that reflects its dwellers' hearts.
trans-unit.target: 银叶林是反映居民真心的活宝石。

trans-unit.target: 银叶林元素

trans-unit.source: o\nG, oc\nT, Discard a card from your hand: Regenerate target creature.
trans-unit.target: 绿，横置，从你手上弃掉一张牌：重生目标生物。

trans-unit.source: When generals gather their armies, healers gather their herbs.
trans-unit.target: 当将军们召集军队时，医生们也在收集草药。

trans-unit.target: 银叶林特使

trans-unit.target: 剑齿蚁

trans-unit.target: 它们会待在战场上，直到吃尽输家。

trans-unit.source: Sacred Prey
trans-unit.target: 圣祥猎物

trans-unit.target: 对柯‧尔林族人来说，看到它是个好兆头。

trans-unit.target: 银镜谷元素

trans-unit.target: 腐生物在残骸上繁殖，而玛凯迪亚最会制造残骸。

trans-unit.target: 2：CARDNAME对每个具飞行异能的生物及每位玩家造成1点伤害。任何玩家都可使用此异能。

trans-unit.target: 持久力

trans-unit.target: 受此结界的生物攻击时不须横置。

trans-unit.target: 牺牲CARDNAME：重生受此结界的生物。

trans-unit.target: 1，牺牲一张地：目标生物得+1/+1直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Like the dryads, the forest itself willingly gives up some of its life for the sake of the future.
trans-unit.target: 如同树灵，森林为了未来，自愿舍弃生命的一部份。

trans-unit.target: 消灭所有结界。

trans-unit.source: Sisay had been restored to her place on the ship, the Legacy had been recovered, and the *Weatherlight* was sailing home to Dominaria. Gerrard focused on the debts he'd settled . . . and on those he'd soon collect.
trans-unit.target: 西赛回到船上复任原职，远古遗产已被寻回，而晴空号也正航向家乡多明尼亚。杰拉尔德开始把心力放在他已偿还的债、以及他应赶快索回的债上。

trans-unit.target: 剧毒气息

trans-unit.target: 在战斗结束时，消灭本回合所有阻挡目标生物、或被其阻挡的生物。

trans-unit.source: The dryads need neither size nor strength to defeat their enemies in battle.
trans-unit.target: 要在战斗中打败敌人，树灵既不需要巨大的身躯，也不需要力量。

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME blocks or becomes blocked by a creature, destroy that creature at end of combat.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME阻挡生物或被生物阻挡时，在战斗结束时消灭该生物。

trans-unit.source: A pretty little death is still death.
trans-unit.target: 小而美的毒物一样要命。

trans-unit.source: Vernal Equinox

trans-unit.target: 树林行者（若防御玩家操控任何树林，则此生物无法被阻挡）

trans-unit.source: You may play CARDNAME any time you could play an instant.

trans-unit.target: （墙不能攻击）\n横置：加一点绿色魔法力到你的魔法力池中。

trans-unit.source: o4, oc\nT: Reveal a creature card in your hand, search your library for a copy of that card, and put the card into your hand. Then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.source: A steel snake with ten thousand teeth.
trans-unit.target: 有著上千只利齿的铁蛇。

trans-unit.target: 谈判桌

trans-unit.source: Although it looks like a game, business around the table is deadly serious.

trans-unit.source: Mercadian soldiers excel at finding things to stand behind.

trans-unit.source: Crooked Scales
trans-unit.target: 歪曲量计

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·291 | Crooked Scales | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: o4, oc\nT: Choose target creature you control and target creature an opponent controls. Flip a coin. If you win the flip, destroy the creature the opponent controls. If you lose the flip, destroy the creature you control unless you pay o3 and reflip the coin.
trans-unit.target: 4，横置：选择目标由你操控的生物，和目标由对手操控的生物。掷一枚硬币。若你赢了此掷，则消灭对手控制的该生物。若你输了此掷，则除非你支付3并且重掷一次，否则消灭你控制的该生物。

trans-unit.source: Crumbling Sanctuary
trans-unit.target: 崩溃的圣坛

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·292 | Crumbling Sanctuary | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: For each 1 damage that would be dealt to a player, that player removes the top card of his or her library from the game instead.
trans-unit.target: 任何玩家每次将要受到1点伤害时，该玩家改为将他牌库顶的牌移出游戏。

trans-unit.source: oc\nT: Target permanent becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: The magistrate seems to prefer a distorted perspective of reality.

trans-unit.target: 每当任何玩家使用咒语时，他可以支付1。若该玩家如此作，则他在回合结束时抽一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·298 | Horn of Plenty | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "This horn is an exact replica of the fabled Horn of Ramos, except mine is more lavish."\n—Mercadian magistrate
trans-unit.target: 「这是传说中瑞莫斯之角的完全再现，只不过我的比较奢华。」\n～玛凯迪亚执政官

trans-unit.target: 每当任何玩家使用所选择颜色的咒语时，你可以支付2。若你如此作，你便获得2点生命。

trans-unit.source: CARDNAME comes into play tapped with two depletion counters on it.\noc\nT, Remove a depletion counter from CARDNAME: Add two blue mana to your mana pool. If there are no depletion counters on CARDNAME, sacrifice it.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进场，且上面有两个消耗指示物。\n横置，自CARDNAME上移去一个消耗指示物：加两点蓝色魔法力到你的魔法力池中。若CARDNAME上没有消耗指示物，则牺牲之。

trans-unit.source: Subterranean Hangar
trans-unit.target: 地底机棚

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·329 | Subterranean Hangar | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
CARDNAME comes into play tapped.
oc
T: Put a storage counter on CARDNAME.
oc
T, Remove any number of storage counters from CARDNAME: Add one black mana to your mana pool for each storage counter removed this way.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进场。\n横置：在CARDNAME上面放置一个储藏指示物。\n横置，自CARDNAME上移去任意数量的储藏指示物：每以此法移去一个储藏指示物，便加一点黑色魔法力到你的魔法力池中。

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·330 | Tower of the Magistrate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tower of the Magistrate
trans-unit.target: 执政官之塔

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·330 | Tower of the Magistrate | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
oc
T: Add one colorless mana to your mana pool.
o1, oc
T: Target creature gains protection from artifacts until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 横置：加一点无色魔法力到你的魔法力池中。\n1，横置：目标生物获得反神器保护直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: MMQ·330 | Tower of the Magistrate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Like the city, weakest at its foundation.
trans-unit.target: 正如此城般，基础处最为脆弱。
